product_name: Columbia Switchback II Jacket - Women's Plus Sizes - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Bring the highly packable women's plus-size Columbia Switchback II Jacket on your next picnic, hike or outing. It resists light rain and wards off breezes that may turn chilly. Omni-Shield(TM) advanced repellency resists moisture and stains. Drawcord hood stows in collar when not needed. Entire jacket stows into left-hand zip pocket. Mesh-lined back vent enhances airflow. Columbia Switchback II Jacket in plus sizes for women features adjustable hem and cuffs to seal out weather. Closeout.
short_description: Bring the highly packable women's plus-size Columbia Switchback II Jacket on your next picnic, hike or outing. It resists light rain and wards off breezes that may turn chilly.
